title: Walmart Global Tech Accelerates Expansion with Plans To Hire Thousands of Technologists and Add New Locations - Walmart Corporate
content: Walmart Global Tech Accelerates Expansion with Plans To Hire Thousands of Technologists and Add New Locations  Walmart Corporate
description: I’m always in awe of how many lives and communities are changed by the work we do at Walmart. The cutting-edge tech we build makes life better for customers and members, further empowers our associates and unlocks new value for our business. Just as our tech stack is the foundation of every…
